title: Godlovesyou
author: Godlovesyou
content: Market is a place of buying and selling with defrauding agreement. People trust and deal with people who can deliver in their terms of agreement. Most client lack trust issues from market people, so the only proves that they're dealing with the right markets is the tale of redeeming of image to others, making sure priorities are place before money, traders should value people interest. Don't comprise original for fake or bridge your agreement terms, or failed to deliver whatever service.Like in cryptosystem where we deal with invisible assets, most sellers are not sincere and most buyers are not genuine, the feeling who will send first has corrupt original intention of what should be. Eg I want to buy bitcoin worth $3000, I got a trader who is will to sell and he or she said send me your money first and I will like no! I don't know you in person, we meet online! You send BTC to me first through wallet eadrefgdvbgjjhhbcjvnhhbbvgnc. Here our trust has been collapse looking for how sincerity will come again becomes a barrier.Market people are interest people, buyers are satisfaction people. Interest and satisfaction makes human insatiable. We should be plain our dealing and the world will trust their money, wealth and resources into your hands.As a trader or bitcoin dealer always stand for the truth, don't steal from people, don't take their money and refused to send bitcoins to the buyer and do verify the buyers profile well enough for a fair transaction.Buyers don't buy what you're not willing to pay. Don't scam people crypto's because fake trust and don't buy on credit to avoid further explanation of losses. Buy what you can afford easy payment. Let's keep dignity, fairness, sincerity and trust for the real business deal.

comments.author: Potato Chips
comments.body: Frankly, scammers will be scammers and they're the last person I expect to have some morals... i doubt pep talks will have an effect on 'em.Quote from: Godlovesyou Like in cryptosystem where we deal with invisible assets, most sellers are not sincere and most buyers are not genuine, the feeling who will send first has corrupt original intention of what should be. Eg I want to buy bitcoin worth $3000, I got a trader who is will to sell and he or she said send me your money first and I will like no! I don't know you in person, we meet online! You send BTC to me first through wallet eadrefgdvbgjjhhbcjvnhhbbvgnc. Here our trust has been collapse looking for how sincerity will come again becomes a barrier.The context here is important. For instance, If you don't have a reputable standing, it makes sense for the other end to be wary of sending first as well. That's why the middle ground approach is to have a reputable middleman/escrow to oversee the trade.

comments.author: Mr. Magkaisa
comments.body: -   When it comes to money, scammers will find ways to scam, because that's their job. That's why if you are going to buy bitcoin from a dealer there should be an esrow intermediary, this is one of the best ways to know how to make your transaction go smoothly.Or if you know how to buy bitcoin at your local location, it is also better or it can also be done at centralized exchanges known in this industry, it's just that simple to do.

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: Honest buyers and sellers sometimes set their own unbreakable rules, and as they experience, their rules can be expanded and it can be difficult to find a final agreement. I'm actually having a hard time finding a solution to this if not first trust each other, unless they involve a third party (and yeah that is avoided a lot because the extra cost isn't desirable).

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: You can scam a person once, but a fool is one who is deceived many times, so scammers rarely has a long record, but only deceives once and hides, while the trader has a long record, that long record is not 100% good, but the good activities outweigh the bad.Thus trust is built over time and not just a random person you deal with.As for the new person who will join the market, he must trust the old members, and so on.

comments.author: wiss19
comments.body: Well, the Bitcoin or cryptocurrency trading you are referring to isn't an issue anymore due to P2P systems where you deal with a peer directly but the assets are taken in escrow by the platform until the funds are transferred. So whether you want to buy Bitcoin or sell yours, the chances of getting scammed by sending first have been reduced largely by this system.I agree with you that service providers or clients should not compromise quality and assess the trust of their customers and deal with transparency. Though some businesses do that, but we will always have both good and bad traders as long as the world exists.

comments.author: Docnaster
comments.body: Legitimate and sincere commercial dealers don't just grow fast in their various businesses of endeavor they also retain long-lasting trust from their respective customers and a secured business brand that will stand a test of time. Honesty is one of best customers satisfactions in business and that is why customers can pay more than the generally known price of a particular product or services to a vendor who's is 100% trusted to deliver than to pay lesser than the actual fee to a vendor with an unknown business credibility. So for anyone to become successful in business, he/she must be trustworthy, legitimate and very sincere to customers because no customer would want go back to purchase a product or service from where he/she was initially scammed no matter how hard you try to convince them of change in credibility.

comments.author: bettercrypto
comments.body: Quote from: hugeblack on March 09, 2023, 10:19:35 AMYou can scam a person once, but a fool is one who is deceived many times, so scammers rarely has a long record, but only deceives once and hides, while the trader has a long record, that long record is not 100% good, but the good activities outweigh the bad.Thus trust is built over time and not just a random person you deal with.As for the new person who will join the market, he must trust the old members, and so on.Very nicely said, I can relate to what you want to point out about this. I can't deny that the scammers in this era are naturally good and smart, they only attack once but they act badly and they don't just victimize one person.      Then the sad thing is that people who have been victimized by scammers even though they know the feeling, they are still not taken away although they don't want it to happen again, but the problem is that they are not careful, alert and sensitive to the actions of a scammer.

comments.author: doomloop
comments.body: Quote from: Docnaster on March 11, 2023, 08:47:54 AMLegitimate and sincere commercial dealers don't just grow fast in their various businesses of endeavor they also retain long-lasting trust from their respective customers and a secured business brand that will stand a test of time. Honesty is one of best customers satisfactions in business and that is why customers can pay more than the generally known price of a particular product or services to a vendor who's is 100% trusted to deliver than to pay lesser than the actual fee to a vendor with an unknown business credibility. So for anyone to become successful in business, he/she must be trustworthy, legitimate and very sincere to customers because no customer would want go back to purchase a product or service from where he/she was initially scammed no matter how hard you try to convince them of change in credibility.Credibility and trust are the two pillars of a business's success. The quality of services or products that are given to the customers also plays a vital role in making a business successful. Those dealers or traders that lack any of these qualities will eventually lose their customers one by one to other vendors within the same business.Sometimes dealers and traders reduce the quality of products and services only to cut the cost of production and save money, without realizing that this will eventually ruin their business and give an edge to the competitors.

comments.author: jashankbabucoach
comments.body: Throughout my 25+ years of experience, I have worked with 15 startups including one unicorn across several industrial verticals such as information technology, social media, software products, manufacturing, education technology, core education, fintech, and the food industry. My core function is in business development. I closely work with the sales/business development team to build client data and handhold them through an organized funnel process, define accountability, and act as a catalyst for the entire organization. I also work with all departments which impact sales like HR, Product/service, Admin, and finance. If you are looking for a mentor who has to handhold your business on a daily basis, guiding the team to grow your business to the next level, you can connect with me for guidance.https://jashankbabu.in/

Interest and satisfaction makes human insatiable. We should be plain our dealing and the world will trust their money, wealth and resources into your hands.As a trader or bitcoin dealer always stand for the truth, don't steal from people, don't take their money and refused to send bitcoins to the buyer and do verify the buyers profile well enough for a fair transaction.Buyers don't buy what you're not willing to pay. Let's keep dignity, fairness, sincerity and trust for the real business deal. if in turn there's dignity, fairness, sincerity and trust in business the business will grow smoothly without any contradictions. Risk is one of the major things to deal with while doing a business.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: bettercrypto on March 11, 2023, 06:06:09 PM      Then the sad thing is that people who have been victimized by scammers even though they know the feeling, they are still not taken away although they don't want it to happen again, but the problem is that they are not careful, alert and sensitive to the actions of a scammer.This feeling is very bad because it is not only an inability to believe in any new investment ideas, but the pain that occurs from losing money in fraud makes the person believe that there is no way to collect money except hard work, which leads him to work long hours and inflation suddenly comes to end years of fatigue. These people rarely invest, but rather focus all their attention on putting money in the bank, buying a house and a car, and then suddenly they realize that they are over forty. Those scammers not only steal money, but also his life and comfort.

comments.author: Sayeds56
comments.body: Quote from: Godlovesyou on March 08, 2023, 07:19:04 PMLike in cryptosystem where we deal with invisible assets, most sellers are not sincere and most buyers are not genuine, the feeling who will send first has corrupt original intention of what should be. Eg I want to buy bitcoin worth $3000, I got a trader who is will to sell and he or she said send me your money first and I will like no! I don't know you in person, we meet online! You send BTC to me first through wallet eadrefgdvbgjjhhbcjvnhhbbvgnc. Here our trust has been collapse looking for how sincerity will come again becomes a barrier.You have opened discussion on a very important topic that revolves around trust, integrity and ethical conduct as fundamental elements for achieving success in the world of business . It is necessary for dealer/trader to fulfill his commitment whether he is dealing kind of trading activities he is conducting including Bitcoin or other crypto currencies. In the world of crypto currencies, trust can be significant issue, as this is relatively new but rapidly growing industry, and due to inherent anonymity of transactions can be challenging when it comes to trust and verification.

comments.author: Porfirii
comments.body: Quote from: Potato Chips on March 08, 2023, 10:35:04 PMFrankly, scammers will be scammers and they're the last person I expect to have some morals... i doubt pep talks will have an effect on 'em.-snip-I don't fully agree with your opinion here, because people can change and I believe in redention, but it is true that changing someone's psychology is not an easy thing in most cases.Quote from: rat03gopoh on March 09, 2023, 08:59:23 AMHonest buyers and sellers sometimes set their own unbreakable rules, and as they experience, their rules can be expanded and it can be difficult to find a final agreement. I'm actually having a hard time finding a solution to this if not first trust each other, unless they involve a third party (and yeah that is avoided a lot because the extra cost isn't desirable).That's the case of good people doing bad things. Context, circumstances, ignorance... can force somebody into the bad direction. There is a saying in Spanish which I'm not sire whether it is also common in English: "Opportunity makes the thieve".Well, nobody said games theory was easy. But a distributed ledger like blockchain can help.

comments.author: thefreethinker
comments.body: Although I'm not one that is very aged and experienced in life, the one thing that I have come to understand and realized in life is that when you you seek real freedom and success, then truthfulness and honesty with no string attached or compromise should be at the forefront of all of your ventures and adventures.

comments.author: Cryptomultiplier
comments.body: It's for sure that a sincere dealer will have patronage and a loyal customer base if they remain authentic, honest and accountable after all said and done. It's one of the grits of becoming successful in business because word of mouth or testimonials from persons who have had the pleasure of doing business with such dealers, will go a long way in bringing more customers and it is the best form of advertising a business needs to grow.

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: Because of the scamming rate on the internet if I am buying anything I make sure that I received the goods before making any payment so I always tell them that I will pay when I have received the goods. And that is Payment on Delivery. Even in cryptocurrency trading, I must see the money in my local bank account first before I released the coins for the buyer even not once you released the coins then your funds is gone and there is no way you can get coins back. So the best way is to be vigilant and careful with trading with with. Someone that has been scammed is always be careful with the activities with others.
